> Hauntly is a mobile application for paranormal investigation and ghost hunting. Available on iOS and Android.

## About Hauntly
Hauntly is the ultimate ghost hunting companion app. It provides tools for detecting and documenting paranormal activity using your smartphone's built-in sensors.

## Key Features
- EMF Detection: Uses the phone's magnetometer to detect electromagnetic field anomalies
- EVP Recorder: Captures and analyzes electronic voice phenomena with AI-enhanced audio processing
- Spirit Radar: Proprietary scanning system that maps paranormal hotspots in real-time
- Investigation Journal: Document investigations with photos, notes, and automatic environmental data logging
- Night Vision Camera: Record video investigations in complete darkness
- Collaborative Investigations: Share real-time sensor data with team members (Pro feature)
